name: unsung

not noticed or praised for hard work, courage, or great achievements: an unsung hero/heroine Many of her achievements went unsung until after her death.

not noticed or praised for doing hard work, being brave, or achieving results: A teacher is often the unsung hero of a great writer’s success.
